page.title: 10Tourism in Frome
page.content: Frome is a nice place to visit. Tourists may visit many places like Bath, Longleat, Wookey Hole, Rode Bird Gardens. They could go to the Sports Centre, and there is much to see in the town. They can visit Cheap Street which is very old. There are a lot of small shops. There is an Information Centre where tourists can go for information about Frome's history. Most tourists come to Frome in the summer from all the areas of the British lsles. The tourists can stay at hotels, or bed and breakfast. Americans come to see where their ancestors usd to live. There are many old houses and they are very interesting inside. Many tourists will come for Frome 1300 this year. There are flags in town and lots of events going on. Wendy Chun
